snippet.title: PlayStation - Ganbare Morikawa kun 2nd Pet in TV (1998)
snippet.description:
DESCRIPTION
Mysterious Artificial Intelligence Creatures
This is your P.I.T. - A Pet in TV! He lives in your TV, and grows with you. He chats to you and eats. Is he selfish? Or maybe he's cheerful? He can be naughty or sulky too.
His character depends on you!
